attr.title: Gloom Reducer
attr.desc: A wandering game with two endings. This game contains discomforting images.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://owch.itch.io/gloom-reducer), download gloom_reducer.zip (Windows) version, extract and copy the game files to the gloomreducer/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [https://owch.itch.io/gloom-reducer](https://owch.itch.io/gloom-reducer), download *gloom_reducer.zip* (Windows) version, extract and copy the game files to the `gloomreducer/gamedata` folder.
